title: New Booking Dashboard for Official UTair WebsiteTravelandtourworld.com
text:
New Booking Dashboard for Official UTair Website Published on : Friday, August 28, 2015
UTair has updated its official website www.utair.ru with a revised ticket booking dashboard. The dashboard is based on a new platform and offers significant improvements to the user interface reflecting modern industry trends, giving UTair website a boost in functionality and making it even more convenient for passengers.
The new booking dashboard features numerous advantages, including a simpler interface for selecting airfare options, fewer steps required for booking a flight, a new feature allowing users to combine airfare groups, and a price overview for the current week. Users with personal account pages can now enable automatic field filling when data entry is required and an option to pay for additional services together with the purchase of tickets in a single operation. Additionally, the shopping cart is now dynamic and available on a single screen together with flight schedules and airfares, making ordering more convenient. The mobile version of UTair website has also been updated with these changes.
“The launch of the updated version of the booking dashboard is yet another step in the development of UTair IT services,” said UTair – Passenger Airlines Vice President for Direct Sales Vitaly Pozdnyakov. “The improvements were guided by suggestions gathered from our customers. We are constantly working on improving the quality of our services and adding new opportunities to use them. We hope our passengers will recognize the benefits of this update.”
